Negative Infinity
===
> Negative infinity.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var NINF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float32-ninf' );
```

#### NINF

Negative infinity.

``` javascript
// NINF is implicitly promoted to a double-precision floating-point number...
NINF === Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
```
<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var NINF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float32-ninf' );

console.log( NINF );
// returns -infinity
```
<!-- </examples> -->
